Package entity.character

Class Character

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.character.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
WeaponUser
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hero, Monster
public abstract class Character
extends Entity
implements WeaponUser
Definition of a Character that can be created in the game.

    • sufferEffect

      public void sufferEffect​(int value)
      Inflict effect into character's body points. Effect can be positive, as a heal, or negative, as damage taken.
      Parameters:
      value - int summed/subtracted to character's health
